name: Careless
description: Someone who doesn't take personal security terribly seriously.

name: Delinquent
description: Refuses to honour outstanding debts, gaining a reputation for untrustworthiness.

name: Anxious
description: Not ready to die for the cause.

name: Addict
description: Addicted to an illicit substance and willing to go to any length to acquire it.

name: Earthbound
description: This person refuses to travel to space.

name: Extorted
description: Feels that they have been taken advantage of financially by our faction.

name: Indebted
description: Owes a very large sum of money to creditors, reducing their credibility.

name: Indulgent
description: Spends lots of money on personal gratification.

name: Marked
description: This councilor has done something public, and terrible, and is the target of surveillance.

name: Pariah
description: Strongly disliked in his or her home nation, this person fares better in foreign lands.

name: Enemy of the State
description: Faces imprisonment or execution in his or her home nation.

name: Non Grata
description: Faces imprisonment or execution in rivals of his or her home nation.
